article: When Mr Black was young, he often played football, and he was good  _  it. But then he went and worked in a town and there was  _  football team for him there, so he stopped  playing  . Then he began to get fat, so he thought, "I stopped playing football and I've got fat. What shall I do?" He thought about it for  a few  days and he said to  _  , "I'll play pingpong." He had some  _  and he played for a few months. He met a nice girl at the club  _  day and they played a game of pingpong against  the other  young man and young woman. Mr Black played very  _  , and he was very sad about this. "I never played  _  than this before," he told the girl. "Oh," she said, "You played pingpong before, didn't you?"
